verbose_text: These findings were then validated in 407 GBM patients with available survival data from TCGA, in which a multivariable Cox model showed a statistically significant association between higher values of WNT6 expression and shorter OS of GBM patients (p = 0.030), independently of other prognostic variables, including patient age (p < 0.0001), Karnofsky performance status (KPS; p = 0.001), gender (p = 0.037) and treatment with chemo- or radio-therapy (p < 0.0001; Table XREF_TABLE).
